name: James Coleman
text: Had a fantastic experience in this place with my friend. The food comes out quickly and the service is just good. Prices are convenient.

name: Sagrey Turjo
text: One of my cool friends work for this store. The day I visited this place it was his birthday. The store is pretty nice and clean. The people who work their are very gentle and ready to help you. They have a parking place as well if you need …More

name: Kannon Pitts
text: Would absolutely recommend visiting this place. Great atmosphere, delightful dishes, awesome customer service. They never disappoint.

name: Trace Cantu
text: This restaurant is excellent and spacious, the food was delightful and the prices were very affordable. quickly, efficient service and very personal waiters. Recommended.

text: Delicious, always hot pizza and kind staff. Theyre awesome!!!

text: Delivery prices through the roof unbelievable medium pie and a 20-oz bottle of Coke $27.00

text: I love this place very much. there is a great feeling. The food is splendid. the service is dynamic and the waiters are very professional. The price is modest. deeply recommend.

text: This is my favorite store I have done business with true to the name fast and acurit delivery top notch

text: ordered at 6:07, at 6:25, still said prepping, called and told 6:45 for pickup... i am guessing wont be ready then either.

text: Terrible disgusting Dry Cold pizza! Terrible customer service! This location took 1 hour 30 minutes what the hell messed my order up first time it came in one hour and 30 minutes while tracker said on the way twice this place needs …More

text: Had a big order for Superbowl Sunday, there was a mistake on my end and the guys working the store made the changes necessary without hesitation. Everything arrived on hot, fresh and on time. Extremely happy with the crew working that Sunday.

Thanks.

text: If the dominos pizza tracker says ready for pick up I shouldn't have to walk in through the door 3 different times. Then they couldn't find my pizza the lady said it was In a different box. So now I'm going to question how this pizza was …More

name: John L
text: Overpriced pizza for delivery. $40 plus for 2 large pies Because I called instead of using online. I was told it’s 7.99 only if I pick up online though after looking at online delivery it was still 7.99 a pie. Shady to me. Last time ordering this slop pizza.

text: Disaster.Today was my second attempt at getting pizzas at this store. Orders are incorrectly filled even though you show them the picture of what you want on their menu.I've had dominos at other stores and always had good food and good service.Not here.Stay away unless you enjoy frustration.

name: Barb T
text: Loved it until it closed. It moved down the block but never opened. It's been 7 months. The phone is out of service.

text: The food,and the service are great, but delivery takes a long time.

text: Subscribe to me on YouTube

text: i placed my order online for delivery and  it came up pick up. I always have problems with this store. Now the charging me more for delivery after i paid online for the order. horrible service

text: my food has been done for thirty minutes now, and still has not even left the store... hope it doesn't get here cold.

name: Avijit Roy
text: Been there several times. Very quick and posh service. Pizza quality is really good. Staffs are very friendly and welcoming. Anik took my order. He gave my pizza with a big smile. Love to come back again.

name: Bill Morales
text: Domino's is not real food, however, it's open late and whatever they're passing for food, hits the spot. The menu is gigantic, so they have many different varieties of not-food. You'll find something to feel really guilty about in the morning. Bad for you, definitely, but in the moment, wonderful. That thin-crust is pretty boss.

name: Johnny Isthebest
text: I ordered my pizza last night at 1am and it was delivered soon after! Great service plus dominoes pizza actually tastes good since they changed how they make it. Doesn’t taste like cardboard at all!

name: Colleen Loughran
text: this store has been closed for so long that i lost count of how many months it’s been. it’s ridiculous. no other dominos delivers to the bellmore area so we’re here with all our rewards points stacking up and they’re gonna go to waste since …More
